name: flows-emails
description:
Emails Design system mapped to user flows.


User flows:

1) Abandoned cart email templates.

Encourage users who abandoned their carts to complete their orders.


2) Holidays emails (SaaS/eCommerce)

With promotions, discounts, recipes, and more, Christmas newsletters get clients in the holiday (and buying) spirit. A great Christmas email will engage the recipient with an engaging Illustration, red, green, and vivid colors throughout, and a clear call to action.


3) Authentication and secure login email templates.

Helping SaaS teams to introduce their new, improved security feature to their users and integrating all required emails faster into their apps faster.
